elements.text:
You are at work and hear some of your coworkers having a conversation behind you. As you listen, you realize that you were not invited to a small gathering, and a few of your coworkers and friends were all hanging out without you. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm sad that they forgot about me.
I'm feeling sad, but decide to think of the good times I've had with my work friends.
I'm glad to have these people as coworkers.
I worry that they left me out on purpose, but remember all of the times I have been included.
I'm calm hearing about what they did.
